topics.body:
Time wasting ramble time!

!http://33.media.tumblr.com/62d02b8d5f1e4ec5b879f2032e7896b8/tumblr_mtcm8xZJDn1qdx71ao1_500.png!

Found this. The funny thing is, if these two were the main characters of Supernatural they probably would have beaten Lucifer in HALF the time it took Sam and Dean. Because they don't spend all their time angsting and actually bother to talk to each other once in while.

Seriously. Quite a few of the issues in that show could have been resolved faster if the brothers learned to stop angsting and talk to each other.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543ef04c63687271ca1d0100#post_543ef04c63687271ca1d0100
No muscle chicks. Only space monster queeeeeens
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543ef0b26368721bd4660100#post_543ef0b26368721bd4660100

Contractual stupidity from the characters happens when dealing with supernatural stuff in fiction.

The exceptions are far in between (Cabin the Woods?)
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543ef0b26368721bd4660100#post_543ef0b26368721bd4660100
I haven't watched Gravity Falls yet but even then I agree.

Even though I LOVED Supernatural some of the problems they went through in that show probably could have been settled in half the time it actually took them. Which reminds me I should finish that show. 

Also I WANT THIS TO HAPPEN!
